main.name: Andrus Chen
main.jobDescription: push pixels, shuffle data, and slap my keyboard until everything works
main.bio: As a teenager at school, I was the kid other students approached about issues with their phones or laptop. I was the go-to guy for fixing any technical problems. Today, not much has changed. I’m still the first point of call for technical issues. The difference is I now also develop innovative software to solve the problems of multinational companies. One of my most recent projects involved designing and rolling out a new piece of software to optimize the efficiency of making better decisions for real estate professionals. In my spare time, I try to learn new technologies and best practices which really keep me up-to-date and growing up all the time.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I am passionate to learn new technologies and best practices, so this really keeps myself up-to-date and keep me growing all the time.

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science, Software Engineering Option
education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Results-driven Front End Engineer at DLT Science Foundation, optimizing analytics dashboard performance, integrating advanced chart features, and ensuring scalability through AWS deployment. Elevated performance and user experience by developing a Next.js frontend for analytics dashboard and coin data, resulting in a 40% increase in page loading speed. Enhanced stock chart capabilities by seamlessly integrating Highchart.js, enabling advanced data visualization options. Achieved a 30% improvement in data retrieval efficiency by utilizing AWS S3 to fetch and generate time series values for the stock chart. Ensured seamless and reliable user access with a successful deployment of the frontend on AWS Amplify and Vercel, resulting in a 99.9% uptime rate. Boosted WordPress site performance and security through meticulous refactoring on AWS EC2, leading to a 25% reduction in loading time and enhanced data protection. Collaborated seamlessly with a team of five developers using Agile methodology and Notion board, expediting project completion by 20%. Demonstrated expertise in problem-solving by swiftly resolving complex technical issues, maintaining uninterrupted frontend functionality and minimizing downtime.

work.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
work.description: Accomplished full-stack developer spearheading the design and implementation of an innovative automatic restaurant ordering system. ● Orchestrated the creation of an automatic restaurant ordering system, meticulously designing the database and employing Java Spring Boot for backend development, resulting in a 40% reduction in order processing time. ● Developed an Android app tailored for smartwatches, empowering restaurant waiters with efficient order management capabilities, contributing to a 25% increase in order accuracy. ● Strategically integrated backend systems with table-installed order buttons, ensuring real-time synchronization and achieving a seamless dining experience for customers, resulting in a 15% decrease in order turnaround time. ● Utilized Angular to craft a user-friendly front-end interface, providing restaurant managers with intuitive controls for overseeing operations, ultimately leading to a 30% improvement in overall managerial efficiency. ● Introduced Install Wizard to simplify initial setup for managers. ● Innovated a statistical module producing dynamic daily, weekly, and monthly employee reports with visual graphs, resulting in a 20% increase in staff productivity. ● Created an efficient Sendinblue API-based email system, reducing data dissemination time by 30% and enhancing decision-making and communication

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Experienced React developer driving UI enhancements and efficient API calls. ● Developed front end with React.js, Implemented Redux data structure, and made APIs calls with redux-thunk. ● Built 100+ components in React using NodeJS asynchronous methods. ● Redesigned our website—increasing visitor clicks by 37% and customer referrals by 12%. ● Assisted in developing server-based Node.js & AWS software by providing inputs and insights, acquiring a 15% increase in the quality of overall work. ● Implemented search functionality using Elasticsearch—decreasing overall service latency by 25.6%

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Andrus on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Andrus excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
testimonials.user: Nikola Matic - Web Developer at SwyftPain
